q1: Is Thibaut Courtois still Belgium's goalkeeper?
a1: Yes, he is currently Belgium's goalkeeper.
q2: Is he a good goal keeper?
a2: I would say he is top 10 worldwide
q3: Will Courtois' recent transfer make him better for Belgium?
a3: Of course he will do better for Belgium because he will compete at a high level and gain experience as a player
q4: Will Belgium win a world cup
a4: France won the World Cup this year, but Belgium was in the finals.
a5: Belgium has shown it has the talent to compete for a World Cup
